title: Christine Lampard exudes elegance in silk-panelled jumpsuit as she poses with dapper husband Frank
text:
They are one of the showbiz world's strongest couples who welcomed their first child together last year.

And Christine and Frank Lampard enjoyed a rare break from parenting duties as they attended the launch of Jamie Redknapp's fashion label, Sandbanks, at London's Mandrake Hotel on Thursday.

The presenter, 40, and her football manager spouse, 41, looked smitten as they posed at the star-studded event, posing arm-in-arm.

Cute couple: Christine and Frank Lampard enjoyed a rare break from parenting duties as they attended the launch of Jamie Redknapp's fashion label, Sandbanks in London on Thursday

Christine exuded elegance in a fitted black jumpsuit with silk panels, paired with a leather belt which cinched in at her slender waist.

The star teamed this with a pair of black stilettos and accessorised with a quilted Chanel handbag.

Her brunette locks were styled in loose waves, parted on the side while her pretty features were enhanced with smoky shadow and a taupe gloss.

Chic: The presenter, 40, and her football manager spouse, 41, looked smitten as they posed at the star-studded event, posing arm-in-arm

Style: Christine exuded elegance in a fitted black jumpsuit with silk panels, paired with a leather belt which cinched in at her slender waist

Stars: Frank posed up with Jamie, his dad Harry and Amit Bhatia at the event

Chelsea manager Frank looked suave in a navy shirt and matching blazer, which he wore with olive green trousers and chestnut brogues.

The couple joined a host of stars including man of the hour Jamie, his I'm A Celeb champ dad Harry, Tiffany Watson, Melissa Tattam and Rosie Fortescue.

Christine welcomed her baby daughter Patricia with husband Frank in September last year. The couple married in 2015.

Glow: Her brunette locks were styled in loose waves, parted on the side while her pretty features were enhanced with smoky shadow and a taupe gloss

Smile: Christine looked gorgeous as she posed up in the street ahead of the bash

MIC stars: Tiffany Watson and Melissa Tattam looked elegant as they attended the bash

She is also stepmother to Frank's daughters Luna and Isla from his former relationship with Elen Rivas.

Christine recently discussed how her body has changed since welcoming her baby daughter Patricia almost a year ago.

The TV presenter spoke to Fabulous about her figure, life as a mum to Patricia and how her body has changed since giving birth - as she revealed she has put on a stone and gone up a shoe size.

Dapper: Harry Redknapp looked sharp in a tweed blazer and waistcoat as he supported his son

Glamour: The MIC ladies looked gorgeous as they attended the bash

Fun times: Jamie posed up with Roman Kemp at the glitzy launch

Suave: Former Union J singer Josh Cuthbert opted for a bright white ensemble as he stepped out

She said: 'I’m wider all round [my waist and hips]. And I’ve gone up a shoe size since I had her! I could do more to try to trim myself back in, but I don’t care.'

'I’m enjoying her and I enjoy a glass of rosé. I mean come on, it’s the summer! I can’t say no to any of it.'

After years of being pressured to start a family, Christine hit back: 'I didn’t give a s**t [about the pressure]. I just never got why it was a question. Whose business is it? And what difference does it make to anybody other than me?
description: Christine and Frank Lampard enjoyed a rare break from parenting duties as they attended the launch of Jamie Redknapp's fashion label, Sandbanks on Thursday.
